title: Classic Chocolate Chip
description1: Our signature brookie bar with rich chocolate chips
description2: Perfect chewy texture that melts in your mouth
description4: Handcrafted with love in small batches

title: Kinder Bueno
description1: Delicious blend of hazelnut cream and chocolate
description2: Inspired by the classic Kinder Bueno taste
description3: Crispy wafer layers with smooth filling

title: Funfetti
description1: Celebrate with our colorful funfetti brookie bar

title: Salted Caramel
description1: Sweet and salty perfection with gooey caramel swirls
description2: Hint of sea salt enhances the rich flavors
description3: Smooth caramel meets chewy brookie base

title: Peanut Butter Bliss
description2: Rich brookie base with creamy peanut butter swirls
